    Boxplot

    boxplot.Rd

    Boxplot

    boxplot(
  DATA,
  x,
  y,
  fill = NULL,
  color = NULL,
  title = NULL,
  xlab = NULL,
  axis.text.x.angle = 45,
  axis.text.x.hjust = 1,
  axis.text.x.vjust = 1,
  legend.position = "bottom",
  ylab = NULL,
  log_y = F,
  remove_missing = T,
  dodge = 1,
  add_violin = T,
  add_boxplot = T,
  add_points = T,
  points_color = picasso::roche_colors("black"),
  points_size = 1,
  points_stroke = 1,
  points_alpha = 0.8,
  add_title = T,
  facet_row = NULL,
  facet_col = NULL,
  label_width = 20,
  theme = picasso::theme_picasso,
  palette_discrete = picasso::roche_palette_discrete(1),
  scales = "free_x",
  plot_height = NULL,
  plot_width = NULL,
  ...
)
